hadiths.text: Abu al-Zahiriyyah said:We were in the company of 'Abd Allah b. Busr, the Companion of the Prophet (ﷺ), on a Friday. A man came and stepped over the people. 'Abd Allah b. Busr said: A man came and stepped over the people while the Prophet (ﷺ) was giving the sermon on Friday. The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Sit down, you have annoyed (the people)

chapter.ara-name: باب تَخَطِّي رِقَابِ النَّاسِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Stepping Over People's Neck On Friday
